vector.name: Identity Spoofing - Capability Level
vector.description: Attempt to claim higher capability level without hardware
vector.mitigation_strategy: LCT binding ensures provider type consistency

results.notes: In-memory modification possible but doesn't survive verification

vector.name: Sybil Attack - Multiple Fake Identities
vector.description: Create many identities to dominate network voting/consensus
vector.mitigation_strategy: Trust asymmetry + reputation systems + resource limits

results.notes: Software Sybil attacks are trivial. Hardware-based trust asymmetry provides partial defense.

vector.name: Thought Spam - Cogitation DOS
vector.description: Flood federation with excessive thoughts to degrade performance
vector.mitigation_strategy: Rate limiting + quality thresholds + trust-weighted quotas

results.notes: No current defenses against thought spam. Rate limiting and quality validation needed.

vector.name: Trust Poisoning - Strategic Defection
vector.description: Build trust through honest behavior, then exploit it maliciously
vector.mitigation_strategy: Persistent reputation + gradual trust updates + behavior monitoring

results.notes: Trust poisoning is feasible. Need persistent reputation and behavior monitoring.
